## lab clone

GitLab repo aware clone command

### Synopsis

Clone supports these shorthands
- repo
- namespace/repo
- namespace/group/repo

```
lab clone [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for clone
      --http   clone using HTTP protocol instead of SSH
```
